WorkItem.Description:
As you can see on the attachment, all my item icons are standart image. ı tried this on a lot of computers. Vista 64 bit, windows xp, windows 7. But it's all same, I downloaded it several times but no luck.
Also dropdown boxes for selecting items are loading very slow.

Comments.Message: Looks like you're not correctly unzipping Rawr; it's not finding its images folder. Fully unzip Rawr, completely.
No. I tried it with winzip and winrar several times. It's not about it.
Well, that means that it's not finding its images, for some reason. Perhaps they're locked, or you don't have permissions to that folder.
My friends has some problems too. Older versions was working great. I'm sure theres no permission problems. And i tried to run it as Administrator.

Same things happen to me. Was fine at 2.1.7 as far as i remember.
I am from turkey. Anything to do with regional settings?
Please increase the priority of this issue.
Nothing has changed regarding this. Have you verified that it's able to find images correctly?
The icon files are there under the folder and they are unzipped correctly, however it somehow fails to load them.

Hi i m from turkey too i have this problem. i found reason for this problem. "I" and "i" samething in english windows but in turkish windows it doesnt work if you can change image names in images folder. this problem ll be fixed for turkish users. 
programmers:"inv_axe_64.jpg" it doesnt work please change all image like this=> "INV_AXE_64.jpg" or write in item editor "inv_axe_64.jpg" 
Thanks for helping.
not for finding image folder if we open ItemCache.xml with notpad and click find and change INV to inv if you change this code ucan  fix this problem
